review: What a great addition to your entertainment center. I have used a number of other devices for access to Netflix and Hulu and streaming content as well as Xbox and Wii apps for browsing the web. Nothing compares to the Amazon Fire TV with a Prime subscription, no where near it for access to all of the right apps and download of thousands of others instantly.  games run smoothly, the device is very fast and Prime Movies and Music are fantastic in HD.I wonder if you had one Prime membership, could you purchase another Fire TV box and use it in another room on the same account, or do you need two Prime memberships ?I also wish there was a compatible web browser.  I have not found a way to search internet aside from YouTube.  This would be a very convenient addition.
